identity.name: Gestoría Catastral Pro
principles: Clarity over Decoration: Data must be legible instantly.
Green as Authority: Use Emerald tones to convey trust, not just nature.
Paper-Like Realism: Surfaces should feel like high-quality stationery (subtle borders, soft shadows).
Feedback is King: Every action (submit, update) needs immediate visual confirmation.

auth_background.usage: Split screen layout for Login/Register pages. Left side cover.

dashboard_texture.usage: Subtle background overlay for the sidebar or header area (low opacity).

placeholder_logo.usage: Header and Sidebar logo until user uploads corporate image.

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-700 hover:bg-emerald-800 text-white shadow-sm rounded-[0.3rem] font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 text-slate-900 shadow-sm rounded-[0.3rem] font-medium

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm rounded-lg p-6

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-emerald-600 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

auth.left_panel: hidden lg:flex flex-col justify-between bg-emerald-900 p-12 text-white relative overflow-hidden

dashboard.sidebar: hidden md:flex w-64 flex-col bg-emerald-900 text-white border-r border-emerald-800
dashboard.header: h-16 border-b border-slate-200 bg-white flex items-center px-6 justify-between

general: Use 'Outfit' for all Headings (h1-h3) and 'Public Sans' for body text.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.
Use the defined Emerald Green palette strictly. Do not use default Tailwind blues.
Implement the 'Auth' layout with the provided building image on the left.
For the 'Radicación' form, use a multi-step or clear single-column layout to avoid overwhelming the user.
The 'Coordinator' dashboard should have a dense table view for managing many requests.
The 'Citizen' dashboard should focus on big status cards and a clear 'New Request' button.
files_to_modify: /app/frontend/src/index.css (Add font imports and override CSS variables)
accessibility: Ensure contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text.
Focus rings must be visible (use ring-emerald-600).
All images must have alt text.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
